question: Which organisation is to launch interface points called ‘Turant Suvidha Kendras (TSKs)’?
option2: Central Board of Indirect Taxes and Customs
answer: Central Board of Indirect Taxes and Customs
explanation:
As per the recent communication from the Central Board of Indirect Taxes and Customs (CBIC), all custom stations would set up Turant Suvidha Kendras (TSKs) by July 15.
The centres would act as the only interface point with Customs officers for physical submission of documents. The Union Budget 2020 proposed to launch nation-wide faceless assessment and this is considered as the first step in the process. CBIC has also inducted several modern testing equipment into the Central Revenues Control Laboratory.
